about_me.des: I am a student at IITR, begin development with python and JS. Life is a continuous learning process, so I spend most of my time learning ,developing and being a Panda .

projects.SigIntChecker: SigInt Checker checks for accidental sigint signal and ask confirmation for exit
projects.Stroom: Stroom plays music in sync in all the connected devices, It uses nodejs to connect and can play in multiple rooms. It is still in development
projects.Youtoo: Youtoo takes in the name of the query ,search the youtube for it and then download it,as simple as that.
projects.Yolog: Beautify your git logs !, Tabulated colurfull commit history with shortened hashes

career.SDSLabs_des: I started learning about development from here only ,I learned a lot and build some cool things
career.pag_des: Programming and Algorithm groups, A group to promote comptetive coding . I started my journey in Programming from here
career.iithbt_des: In IITHbt I joined in finance department but switched to Web development .By the way IITHbt is a magazine.
career.college_des: At August,I Joined IITR for B.Tech in CSE field, Probably the best decison in my life
